page.title: 06Recreation
page.content: The library, which, besides loaning books, presents plays and General Knowledge Quizzes for young and old people alike. Recreation for the older people include bingo,gardening, social clubs and sports including bowls. For the younger generation Chelmsley Wood offers plenty. Youth and church clubs offer dancing evenings and many sports including judo, boxing and weight training. Football is a major interest with many boys participating. There is a BMX track which is very popular and the sports centre offers swimming and squash.Fairs and carnivals come to the area quite often with fancy dress and other competitions for all to enjoy. Boating is also a popular pastime in this area. Music is also a very popular interest.Many people enjoy music of one kind or another and visit the local NEC to see musical concerts.
